name: wobble yoga
description:
Made in under 24 hours for Ludum Dare 35 (I decided to do LD on Saturday night). The theme is Shapeshift. This game was inspired by my previous yoga game, which you can play here.

CONTROLS

  • [E] Left Wrist | [I] Right Wrist
  • [F] Left Elbow | [J] Right Elbow
  • [V] Left Hip | [N] Right Hip
  • [C] Left Knee | [M] Right Knee
  • [SPACE] Torso

All music, art, and code by yours truly.
